short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to manage your Vietnam stock values

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We have 3 core features:
- Manage daily profit/loss of a specific stock
- Manage daily profit/loss of all assets
- Help everyone to avoid being noticed by their bosses at work 
while looking at stock charts. =)

It supports all stocks from : 
- HOSE
- HNX
- UPCOM
